website_summaries.verdict: A respectable update to its very popular A6000 mirrorless interchangeable-camera model, the Sony A6300 remains great but also retains some of the drawbacks of its predecessor.
pros: The Sony A6300 delivers class-leading photo and video quality, plus good performance and features for shooting action
cons: Myriad small annoyances mar the experience and it has the trademark poor battery life of Sony's A series
Plus it really could use in-body image stabilization

customer_reviews.title: This camera functions like a $3,000-$5,000 DSLR.
customer_reviews.text: After months of research on a new camera, I made the right choice and bought this mirrorless Sony. I bought this for the 4K video quality, beyond impressed! I was not intending on using the photograph functions on this camera but the photo quality & functions way exceeded my expectations. My older regret is not spending a little more to by the larger lens. Very lightweight & portable which compared to my old DSLR. I wish the battery life was better but it’s not a deal breaker. In response to the camera heating up. I’ve only had it feel hot one time during a long video file. It did not shut off. Another recommendation is buying an external microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Paterson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic APS-C sensor, impressive autofocus
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from NEX-6, I didn't expect much improvement, but oh boy was I surprised! The colors are much better, it has significantly higher dynamic range, and the photos are sharper and have less noise. Impressive autofocus and great auto-ISO capabilities are big pluses too.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful images even on auto - no tinkering necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Be prepared to take time to learn a LOT about this camera, even if you are an experienced digital photographer. The options and programmability on the a6300 is impressive. First annoying bit: cannot quickly switch from single shot to multiple shot - have to go into menu. Although it may be programmable into one of the free slots on a button - haven't learned that yet! If you're serious, invest in a Zeiss zoom lens for an equivalent amount to camera and you're good to go. (f4 lenses are perfect as the a6300 has a top ISO of 52,000! Shoots with f4 lens in the DARK. I tried it.)
customer_reviews.author: Elenabel

customer_reviews.title: Old birdwatchers will love this camera
customer_reviews.text: and my wife is an old birdwatcher. She has worn out three previous Sony Alpha cameras because she takes millions of pictures. Not kidding, her select pictures now total more than half a million and she throws away dozens for each select pic. She is in her 70s now and the heavier cameras are a problem after hours of holding it up. The Sony A6300 is light and does everything she wants. It is a challange to set up special modes but there are web sites out there that tell you how to do it with examples. She uses the 55-210mm lens and gets great shots.
customer_reviews.author: 2old2work

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Better Feel and Near Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I started with the Sony A6000 and used it along with my Nikon D500 to see how it would work out. The A6000 was too light, had a not so good viewfinder and buttons that felt flimsy and not so ergonomic. Now that I have the A6300 to compare, it definitely is a heavier, sturdier and all around camera better to handle and hold. Though I still prefer the Nikon D500, the Sony A6300 is a close second.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New silver a6300!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased the new silver version of the a6300 and I love how it looks! I wanted a new camera that gave me great quality images but did not want to carry my DSLR around anymore so after much research, I decided to switch to the Sony a6300. The new silver color makes the camera stand out and overall, it's an amazing camera. Looking forward to what I will be able to get out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Santos Legaspi

customer_reviews.title: Camera error, could not take any photos.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera In "Used like new" condition from Amazon. According to Amazon this means a new camera, but it was returned at some point. This camera was defected, I couldn't even take a photo. When I go to take a photo the shutter would make two clicks then camera would tell me there was an camera error, and to turn off power. At this point camera will not turn off at all unless battery is pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fortener

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that far exceeds my skill and talent.
customer_reviews.text: Some day i’ll grow into this camera. My only nit is that there is a short but notable lag from the time I switch on the camera to the time it is ready to shoot a picture. My old Nikon D70 was instantaneously ready to shoot when switched from off to on. Also, the lens selection is still sparse and pricey.
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: my best friend
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing camera for a beginner. ive learned so much and got some amazing memories with this camera. bought 2 more lenses and some gear and take it on every trip. its become a new hobby. ive started teaching my gf how to use it and shes been enjoying the hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel.C

customer_reviews.title: Feared I would regret spending so much on a camera.  To my relief, those fears were completely unfounded.
customer_reviews.text: This has not replaced my Canon Powershot SX160 point and shoot due to it's high price point, but it is much lighter (and faster) than my old Canon T5 Rebel, since this is a Mirrorless and the Canon T5 Rebel is a DSLR with a penteprism. It's small size and portability, combined with the fact that a SELP1650 16mm-50mm lens can stay attached and still squeeze into my camera bag, makes it my go-to for hikes, bicycle trips, and vacations (though I will also bring my trusty Canon FS200 camcorder with me for its 40x optical zoom video capability, and my Lytro for macro photography).
customer_reviews.author: Randall J. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Sony a6300 is a beast! Even after these few years of it's release it's still an amazing, sought after camera. For video work it's stellar! 4k work is outstanding. For it to be 8-bit it doesn't lag too far behind the 10-bit cameras. In some test the differences were negligible. ISO performance through the roof! I often shoot video in s-log with high ISO's and the results are incredible! 5 stars for this camera!
customer_reviews.author: richard a. evans

customer_reviews.title: Developed a problem a couple months out of warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Initially was good, but it developed a problem with the top dial three months out of warranty and the dial will simply flip back and forth between to items rather than scroll continuously (ie. go back and forth between 2 fstops, or 2 images in gallery). So, all in all, that makes a pretty expensive camera averaged over the lifespan of 15 months. The weird thing is I beat the heck out of my NEX7: multiple drops, dirty, soaked in thunderstorms, and it still works. This A6000 was babied, never dropped, was never in a dusty or wet environment. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Spesard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. This camera may not be as loaded as the A6500 but it still provides plenty of features and excellent video capabilities. There are so many features I have yet to discover all of them but I'm still learning as I go. Picture quality is amazing and the video is superb. It's quite a lot of money for a camera but I look to it as an investment and so far I think it's going to be a good one. I've been getting a lot of photography done and a lot of video work as well. Sony has really hit h omeruns with their cameras lately and this one is no different.
customer_reviews.author: PeteTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: I've bought so many sony cameras: FS700 FS7 FS5 a5100 a6300 a6400 a7sii If you delve into picture settings and white balance and really dial in your settings you can squeeze out an amazing image. Also use it for stills from time to time but not with autofocus which I hear is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this. Faster
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Nikon D7000. We LOVE this. Faster, better more reliable autofocus, and half the size. I was a huge Nikon fan (the 7000 my third Nikon), but they've got to do better to charge their premium rates. This thing rocks. If I buy full frame I'll go SONY as well. Only limitation is slightly few lens options, but this takes so much better pics, that seems less relevant.
customer_reviews.author: DocVader

customer_reviews.title: Switched from a DSLR and loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had dslr cameras for years both personally and professionally and only recently decided to change my personal equipment from a canon to a mirror less Sony and oh boy have I loved it. There are plenty of in depth reviews about people switching and advantages so I won’t bother getting into that but as a consumer and reviewer, I LOVE this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Some Background: Point and Shoot photographer who pulled the trigger after avoiding DSLRs for the size factor for so many years. Settled on the mirrorless and decided to go with the crowd on the A6300 along with 35mm lens. So happy I did - I probably got top 8 of 10 of my all time favorite photos and have had it for less than a month. I think that it is the combination of 35MM lens and a6300 that is producing the magic. Suggestion is to skip Kit Lens entirely. Auto mode is producing such good pictures that don't think will even bother to learn about the other options. IMO, all the gushing reviews with hyperboles are correct.
customer_reviews.author: abale

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera. love everything except he fact that manual is not accessible on the web or anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Capturing images are an important tool in recording life's images memorories
customer_reviews.text: The camera appears to capture color images accurately with good exposure and image dynamic range, except under extreme environmental conditions. I've taken over a 1,000 images to date and have found the only problem is battery life. Probably needs additional battery/larger size battery for my usage. I need to explore this.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this product to anyone looking for quality in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I always was a canon user I never knew anything else until my brother told me about the Sony a6300. I have completely converted to a full-time Sony user. highly recommend this product to anyone looking for quality in a compact camera!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, delighted with the upgrade from my Nex 5 & 7. Battery life is good (depending on lens), picture quality is outstanding. Autofocus is amazing for kids, keeps up with the fastest moving objects. Can make anyone look like an outstanding photographer
customer_reviews.author: Damien Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as SLR, but so much smaller
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as SLR, but so much smaller. The little lens on this is a marvel, but I did get some higher quality vintage and newly designed lenses for this.
customer_reviews.author: amaleshk

customer_reviews.title: Flawed but great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! Stunning, razor keen 4K video marred by relatively soft 1080p, rolling shutter, overheating issues and poor battery life; that and the lack of in-body stabilization prevent me from rating it higher. In spite of those issues, I love the photography, the KILLER autofocus, S-log and Picture profiles, the form factor and the WORLD CLASS 4K outpur!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Binns

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera amazes me!!! The IQ I'm getting from this camera attached to the Sony fe 70 200f4 blows my mind. I currently own a Sony a7, Sony a7ii and now this camera, in some ways this little camera is better than the a7 & a7ii. It has faster AF, FPS and can shoot 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Carim Del Río

customer_reviews.title: One of the best crop sensor cameras on the market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best crop sensor cameras on the market. Huge step up in focusing from the A6000. Only thing to make it any better would be is if it was weather sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick lenn

customer_reviews.title: Me like.
customer_reviews.text: Me like. Amazing camera. No need to go in depth because there's plenty of information about this camera online but definitely couldn't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It takes time to get used to this camera and its settings. Great pics, quality + connection with your smartphone. When filming, the auto focus is great, but can also be disturbing. I think the biggest challenge is that the camera does not seem to record audio properly. I've tried it with a Rode microphone on top, but still it is not as great as I wish it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overheating fixed with firmware update!
customer_reviews.text: Video overheating fixed with firmware update! Great pictures. Took some time to get used to the settings coming from a Canon, but easy to get used to after a while. Wonderful pictures of the little one. Just wish Sony would come out with affordable e-mount lenses comparable to Canon lenses. If they do, they may take over the aps-c market!
customer_reviews.author: NexusOwner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful video quality and a great gimbal camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, small, portable, and amazing video quality for the price. Best camera in it's price range by far. Get it. I use it with the Zhiyun Crane gimbal for silky smooth dynamic shots.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice small camera that takes nice sharp pictures with the kit 16 to 50mm lens. The menus and buttons takes some time to figure out. This will be my vacation travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jimo

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful camera, very flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera, very flexible, light, and the quality of images is wonderful. This is a definite yes and I tried most of the mirrorless cameras. Sonys are by far the best - by which I mean most usable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-john Hart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: My first camera purchase other than my smartphone. Absolutely love the camera and this lens for introductory photography. With a few changes in the settings I was able preset buttons and have the camera work better for me. Video quality is incredible and I highly recommend this for somebody looking for a great camera that gives you the best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mirrorless.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mirrorless camera. I can say that I am highly impressed with it. I was irritated at first with no touchscreen, but the long list of other great features it has outweighs that major con. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Canon DSLR until it was stolen while traveling in Ecuador. I loved my DSLR, but I am really impressed with the Sony A6300 mirrorless. It is compact, light, and so easy to shoot with right out of the box. The pictures are just some I snapped to test the kit lens. I do wish I had opted for the full frame, but the price point and quality can't be beat on the Sony 6000 series. The kit lens is of course lacking, but what kit lens isn't. Invest in some good lenses and you will have a great camera to shoot a diverse range of photography subjects and settings.
customer_reviews.author: Travelistabonita

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: My first camera, even though my friends have Nikons. Love this little guy. I've used it for a few months and everything works as expected! Nothing bad to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Deiket Desse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, i love the 4k capability, of course the camera get hot sometimes but is a really good one, if you want to buy this or the 6500, you can save a lot of money buying the a6300
customer_reviews.author: Maiku

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 4K video quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised for the amazing quality of the camera, the only con I found was the overheating recording at 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Omar M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely The Best
customer_reviews.text: An absolute joy to use. Check out all the positive reviews on You Tube. Coming from a DSLR (heavy, bulky) this is a pleasure to have and use. Fantastic electronic viewfinder, low light photos are really good. All photos directly from the camera without any editing are the best I have seen in all the past three DSLR's I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera. I have huge hands so it feels a bit underwhelming, but I knew that when purchasing it. The Viewfinder is great, a bit small though - I might buy an adapter. The rear screen is nearly invisible during sunlight so make sure you get a sunshade adapter.
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! I upgraded from an rx100 and pictures and video are really sharp. Auto focus is quick and reliable. Only con is the battery life but I could not dock a Star for that since overall quality is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: As I’m getting to understand my Sony Alpha 6300 I haven’t mastered it as yet, but it’s a great buy and once I get more familiar with the settings it will produce much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Seyon Reid

customer_reviews.title: Sony's best in class for this format
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to its billing as Sony's best (and best in class) in this format. Just wish lenses weren't so expensive (and large) for this E lens APS-C format camera. Great pictures, fast, though I've had a few out of focus on off-center subject at high-frame rate mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This camera definitely has a learning curve if you're coming from any other brand but is 100% worth it especially if you're using it for video.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley George

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Bought it specifically for the face recognition, and eye-focusing. Eye focusing has it's limitations (such as if half the face is covered with a scarf or beanie). but other than that, I can finally get sharp images of my son running towards me full speed!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER WU

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to it's excellent ratings. I also have an a6000 and find this upgrade was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlies Pal

customer_reviews.title: I had the a6000 and that camera was great. They didn't need to improve that much on ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera out preformed my expectations by a million times. I had the a6000 and that camera was great. They didn't need to improve that much on this camera but I do like the metal body and 4K options. I feels so much better in my hands. I feel like I'll keep this as my main camera for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super Duper
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever had. I take close photos of kittens so I purchased a 30mm fixed lens. With your smartphone you can control the camera's functions to capture. You can also upload pictures wirelessly to your smart phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee Cat Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. For a few Hundred more you can get a touch screen a6500. But I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: najee

customer_reviews.title: Overheating big time!
customer_reviews.text: As a Sony camera owner for many years I'm disappointed to see that the same over heating problem when shooting video is still there. My old NEX 6 did not have this problem and the latest, state of the art technology cannot surmount the overheating issue is just mind boggling to me.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Fatu

customer_reviews.title: tiny beast
customer_reviews.text: awesome video quality, better suitable for videography..photo is also pretty good quality however, i would prefer this for pro quality video and very decent photography. One drawback is battery life. Ok for still but you must carry extra if you want to use video
customer_reviews.author: Gdev

customer_reviews.title: This camera is so sharp. I use it with ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so sharp. I use it with a Beholder gimbal and it shoots flawless, gorgeous movie quality video. Battery life is a concern. I don't use this as a still camera however because it seems slow to process photos. For that I still use my Nikon D3100.
customer_reviews.author: Parkhouse

customer_reviews.title: took it rock climbing and it took a bunch of ...
customer_reviews.text: took it rock climbing and it took a bunch of hits, It lasted well though, nothing broke and works fine
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Little overheat issue
customer_reviews.text: The overheat issue make you lost time, but the size is amazing for that quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Valencia Foto Y Video

customer_reviews.title: Fun and professional! A great combo !
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy ! I use it for travel and landscape. I also own the A9 and A7Rll which I love for portraits, but this nugget is a lot of fun and takes quality pix !
customer_reviews.author: L. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A 'jack of all trades' camera that is near the ...
customer_reviews.text: A 'jack of all trades' camera that is near the 'master' at most of them. My daily driver. Really wish that it had in body image stabilization, but overall image and video quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues and best value camera at the time.everything you need without anything you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: followyoursole

customer_reviews.title: This camera is incredible for the price, you cant ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is incredible for the price, you cant go wrong. Even though it may not be as light sensitive as the a7s, a camera that costs 3 times as much, it still handles low light extremely well. See image, 4K/24p video screenshot with full moon and a tiny LED for fill, taken at 1AM using ROKINON 12mm f2.0
customer_reviews.author: Ai Wintermute

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: My very first camera. Not disappointed at all. It has some good weight to it, does not feel cheap. Only dislike about the camera is the User interface, could be a bit more user friendly but hey, everything isn't perfect. Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ramaique Tota

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I like the small form factor of mirrorless and this delivers. The firmware update seems to have helped any overheating issues. I only had the temperature warning flash, never shut off on me. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrorless camera
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for few years now and pleased with how well the camera has held up during the years I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera as a B-camera for photos and videos and frequently find it taking the lead instead. Nice and lightweight, this camera can be put anywhere and still deliver a high-quality product. When shooting outdoors in the heat, it can overheat easier than our a7s and a6000. Overall, a great purchase and a valued addition to our arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace my NEX 5N. It is light and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: ludiliu

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Portability, speed, and focal tracking are simply amazing. 4K video is just a bonus for this little gem. If you liked the a6000, you will LOVE the a6300.
customer_reviews.author: Consoomer_at_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera to bring everywhere you go i have the a7rII but this is the camera i bring to most places unless I'm shooting professionally
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best camera's on the market. Quality of pictures are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an upgrade to the a6000. Coupled with the 4K, slightly better low light capabilities, S-log, and an improved viewfinder, it was definitely worth the upgrade. However, it doesn't have in body stabilization like the a6500, but it's also not $1300.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: My first mirrorless, so far so good. Other than battery life this is nice for traveling and on the go shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Seymore Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot, great image quality, but the controls are pretty goofy. Will have to do some study to get the best out of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, unfortunately I've had it overheat several times on shoots. I like it but wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Burnett

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful camera. The focus in video mode is super ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful camera. The focus in video mode is super fast. The view finder is much sharper and not so grainy.
customer_reviews.author: Meng Thao

customer_reviews.title: ... replaced my Sony Nex 5N and it was a great decision. I can still use all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Sony Nex 5N and it was a great decision. I can still use all of my e-mount lenses but this camera is truly superior. It focuses very quickly, I don't have to attach a viewfinder or a flash because they are both included. It is a bit larger and heavier but actually feels better with a longer lens.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: so good! I'd recommend saving the money from the kit ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I'd recommend saving the money from the kit lense and buy a highly rated prime or zoom, instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on body
customer_reviews.text: I like to be the guy who puts the first scratch on his toys but I was deprived of that right with my new Sony 6300. Hmm...
customer_reviews.author: Les Dossey

customer_reviews.title: Really good entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is portable, easy to use, and the quality is amazing as well! I'm satisfied with the results :)
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a Pro can tell the difference but this 6300 works good for me
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy a A7 but since i'm not a pro i went with the 6300 instead and saved myself a few hundred bucks! Maybe a Pro can tell the difference but this 6300 works good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lei Tong

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are great. But I think I will get a prime
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. The pictures are great. But I think I will get a prime lens
customer_reviews.author: Popsalopagus

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, 4K quality and Auto Focus!
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera! I’m in FL and it came first day of shipping expectations. Love the quality. Bought as a previously owned but fresh out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Trill Lill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but definitely needs more than the kit lens to really shine.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Shipps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Very fast and the auto tracking is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera so far so good fast focus and tracking Sony has another winner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Professional photographer approved
customer_reviews.text: Already owned a 6500 and wanted another one to add to the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Incredible images, compact and rock-solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm usually wary of Sony products, this camera is incredible. So fast and solid that it feels like a classic mechanical device rather than an electronic gadget. With a Sigma f/1.4 prime lens, every shot is straight out of National Geographic. In about 2000 photos and videos so far, there have been virtually zero pictures that were not beautiful. Video quality is amazing as well, as is slow motion and even the stereo audio recording. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Casual Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, poor memory function execution.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT camera. I updated from a SONY A6000. My only complaint is that of the 6 camera memory features, 4 of them are stored on the SD card. If you format the card, the 4 stored there are GONE! They should be stored in the camera, and should have the ability to be labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great design, built well, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular camera. Designed well, compact, with today's best tech.
customer_reviews.author: The49er

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This does everything you need it to. Batteries run through fast but just buy a couple spares - are you really that cheap? And the menu system is FINE - don't be put off by having to learn something. It works amazingly well!
customer_reviews.author: Masi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the A6000 - which was a top-notch camera!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Mui

customer_reviews.title: Best 1st camera
customer_reviews.text: It's now been over a year since I got this camera and believe me, It's the best camera you can get for the money, but I would recomend getting a decent lens too.
customer_reviews.author: Modestas

customer_reviews.title: why not buy ?
customer_reviews.text: Just love sony camera only now. Good for wedding party quick shoot.
customer_reviews.author: duyson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera for the price. Very easy to use even for amateurs. Great quality picture and the audio is good too.
customer_reviews.author: MMogensen

customer_reviews.title: 120FPS Video FTW!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera with 120FPS video and was thrilled to find this. It is an excellent camera all around. I love it! The kit lens is better than I expected (I guess I didn't expect decent Bokeh). Camera is great in low light. Great automatic exposure. Great and fast focusing. Super quality video. Great continuous focus during video. I've been using a Canon 60D, which I like, but I'm really happy with the a6300 as my all purpose still photos camera and my specialty video camera.
customer_reviews.author: John Weise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the battery life. Definitely invest in extras.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky F babay

customer_reviews.title: Really great camera, but battery is sub-par
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great photos and is really compact. Sony has done an amazing job with this, but the biggest downside I've had is with the battery. As a shutterbug when traveling, I like to capture a lot of things, like architecture, people, tourist stuff, and random photographs. an average charge on a battery will last me a few hours, not an entire day, like you'd get with my Canon 7D dSLR that I've been equally active with. Granted they are massively different in size, but I'd hope that Sony would make a longer-lasting battery. I bought 2 additional batteries as "insurance" in case I'm out in the field and a battery dies out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best camera of the year!! Upgraded from Nex6 and it is much better in every aspect.Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MAXMSU

customer_reviews.title: This camera is a beast.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun shooting. It is quite a difference from a6000 in a positive way. Low light performance is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes amazing pictures. 4K video is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing pictures. 4K video is fantastic. Picture quality top notch. Get a couple lenses and your good to go. Never going back, mirrorless is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! Still learning all the settings. Thanks Amazon for amazing service!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pienaar

customer_reviews.title: Best Mirrorless Camera On The Market
customer_reviews.text: This camera meets every single one of my expectations! There are no issues or things I wish the camera had. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hachard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I'm shooting video and photos. Doing a short soon. Best purchase of the year for me.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rice

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: Took the camera for filming the video! The quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera beyond words. I have no issues with settings or buttons and when I pre-ordered it I also ordered an extra battery as well... so no issues there either. UPDATE: As of June 10 2016 I am still unable to set this camera down!
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Tatum

product_meta.title: Sony Alpha a6300 Mirrorless Camera: Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera with APS-C, Auto Focus & 4K Video - ILCE 6300 Body with 3” LCD Screen - E Mount Compatible - Black (Includes Body Only)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Base| Configuration:BaseWorld’s fastest autofocus speed and most extensive autofocus coverage plus newly developed 24.2 MP APS-C Sensor, high resolution 4K video recording and more. Do not handle damaged or leaking lithium ion batteries
feature_bullets: Faster Autofocus: Shoot up to 11fps with 425 phase detection auto focus points and 0.05 sec AF speed
Incredible Photography: Advanced 24.2 MP Exmore CMOS sensor expands sensitivity and minimizes noise
Electronic Viewfinder: Cameras feature a high resolution XGA OLED Tru-Finder for enhanced viewing
4K & HD Recording: Record professional content with multiple movie functions and full pixel readout
Compact & Durable: Dust and moisture seals protect the magnesium alloy body from harsh conditions
